detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in a cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam with ties at the front and flared sleeves with pleats at the cuffs.
Vest top in ribbed organic cotton jersey with a button placket.

Short dress in lace with a V-neck front and back, horizontal ties at the back of the neck and long sleeves. Seam at the waist and scalloped edges around the neckline and hem. Recycled polyester lining.

Non-wired bandeau bikini top with a decorative ring at the front, lined, gently padded cups with removable inserts, narrow detachable shoulder straps and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Knee-length skirt in woven fabric containing some mulberry silk with a concealed zip and a slit at the back. Lined.

Trousers in a softly draping weave. High waist with pleats and a narrow tie belt, zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, pockets in the side seams, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Straight-cut coat in a soft wool blend with notch lapels and a concealed double-breasted front. Diagonal front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.

Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour, a small stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Discreet side pockets and a decorative, zipped sleeve pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Short shorts in a patterned viscose weave with wide, covered elastication at the waist and pockets in the side seams. Wide legs with rounded hems.
Suede slides with a bow at the front, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
Boxer shorts in stretch, fast-drying, breathable, functional fabric with wide elastication at the waist and slightly longer legs.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar and cuffs.
Oversized T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a round neckline, gently dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.
Beret in a soft textured knit containing some mohair.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Satin top with spaghetti shoulder straps, a V-neck with a transparent section at the front and narrow, horizontal straps at the back. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in soft cotton jersey. Bodice with a wide decorative frill at the front, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and round neckline with a narrow ribbed trim.
Pyjamas with a jersey top and flannel bottoms. Top with a motif on the front and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a cool cotton weave with a V-neck, wrapover top with embroidery and wide shoulder straps with pin-tucks. Concealed zip in one side, a seam and wide band with pin-tucks under the bust and a skirt with pleats to create width.
Short dress in stretch, denim-look jersey with a round neckline, yoke at the front and a visible zip at the back. Long, wide, cuffed puff sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Pyjama shorts in satin with a slight sheen. Elasticated waist and flounce at the hems.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Shirt in woven fabric with a collar, classic front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Matching tie or bow tie in satin with an adjustable elastic strap.

Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Unlined.
Pyjamas with a top and tight shorts in jersey made from a cotton blend. Shorter top in a wide fit with dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Ankle-length running tights in an extra-firm, tight fit that focuses on the thighs. The tights create pressure on the legs that is highest at the hems and is gradually reduced towards the top to aid circulation. The special design and high elastane content help the tights to retain their effect and properties over a long period. Elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, mesh key pocket in the waistband, and reflective details.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Padded all-in-one suit in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, faux fur-trimmed, padded hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, elastication at the back and reinforced sections at the back and knees. Small zipped pocket at the top, covered elastication at the cuffs and hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Reflective details. Lined. The all-in-one suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with adjustable straps, front and back pockets and slim legs.
Fine-knit, V-neck jumper in a soft viscose blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides.

Mesh dress with a glitter print, wide shoulder straps and a decorative wrapover at the top. Press-studs and a detachable bow at the back, a seam at the top and a pleated skirt with a double lining for extra width. Lined.
Fully lined, 5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Top in soft velour with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slightly wider legs.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Short dress in woven fabric with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, short, wide sleeves and detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Chino shorts in a washed cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets. Regular fit.
Double-layered, straight-cut top in airy chiffon with spaghetti shoulder straps.

Trousers in nylon with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Diagonal side pockets, a back pocket with a concealed zip and mesh-lined leg pockets with a flap and concealed zip. Small, reflective motif on one leg and an elasticated drawstring at the hems. Unlined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Long metal earrings decorated with sparkly stones.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Top in a softly draping viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a gathered seam with a wide flounce at the hem.
Short-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Oversized jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide top in soft, crêped viscose jersey with short cap sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist and lined gusset.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Elastic bracelets in various designs, one with a small metal pendant in the shape of a feathered wing.
T-shirt in soft, printed slub cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline, sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves and slits at the hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.

Ankle boots in imitation leather with covered block heels and chisel toes. Visible seams front and back, a concealed zip on the inside and a loop at the back. Linings in jersey made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather. Heel 6.5 cm.
Shorts in a textured cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a press-stud.
High profile Chelsea boots in soft leather with elastic gores down both sides of the shaft. Organic cotton linings and leather insoles. Heel 5 cm.
Fine-knit jumper with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Small shoulder bag with a metal chain shoulder strap, flap with a decorative metal ring and magnetic fastener, and two inner compartments. Lined. Size 4x14x22 cm.
Running vest top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Cable-knit jumper in lightweight cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Padded parka in sturdy fabric with a detachable, pile-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a wind flap and press-studs. Welt chest pocket, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Ankle-length fancy dress skirt in jersey with a high, elasticated waist and chiffon flounces at the top. Seam above the hem with several layers of mesh and chiffon. Unlined.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.

Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in a viscose weave. V-neck top with a lace trim at the top and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Shorts with smocking at the waist, wide legs and lace-trimmed hems.
Fitted, sleeveless dress in ribbed jersey with a deep V-neck front and back. Unlined.

Short, boxy jacket in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, high collar and zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Straight-cut T-shirt in a relaxed fit made from velour in a soft cotton blend.
Oversized cardigan in soft, fine-knit wool with a tie belt at the waist, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in patterned slub cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and a tab and button on the sleeves.
Hooded jacket with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short A-line skirt.
Round earrings in metal painted in various colours.

Straight-cut shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
